alert.note: Alert for Audrain; Montgomery; Pike (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 08 at 3:28AM CDT until May 08 at 4:00AM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 400 AM CDT FOR EASTERN AUDRAIN COUNTY IN CENTRAL MISSOURI...NORTHERN MONTGOMERY COUNTY IN EAST CENTRAL MISSOURI AND SOUTHWESTERN PIKE COUNTIES IN NORTHEASTERN MISSOURI... At 327 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Wellsville, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. At 315 AM a 58 mph wind gust was reported at Mexico Memorial Airport. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Vandalia, Wellsville, Laddonia, Bellflower, Farber, Martinsburg, Buell, New Hartford, Middletown, and Ashley. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
